title: (x) The Caribbean Traders - Adobe Serif substitution font {Eduardo}
content: Could someone please help me font this font? Thank you! ![Caribbean Trader.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/board-post.pl?action=posting_upload_form&what=show&img=19541)
author: julia

comments.content: Looks like Adobe Serif (substitution font for missing ones).

I'm not in love with the substitution fonts, a lazy person looking at a blueprint might actually not notice the font change while concentrating on the content of the words they made. I'd rather have a horrible bitmap to sound an alarm that there was a problem.
